item.title: John Le Carré - Left Wing or Right Wing?
item.description: Last autumn, for some reason the thought occurred to delve into the famous late author’s work for the first time. It may have something to do with the noble Carne Ross, whose work we were also exploring. Yes, the book A Delicate Truth is reputedly, and partly, based on the truth-seeking, campaigning diplomat whose interesting TEDx talk “The Accidental Anarchist” has received over one hundred thousand views. For our first dip we chose the aforementioned work, along with an earlier mid-period classic Our Game.
